name: Core Spawn Crawler
senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 15
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The crawler has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the crawler’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The crawler makes four attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the start of the crawler’s next turn.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
